title: Study
description: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.

links.name: Project
links.label: Study references the Project it is part of.

submitter_id_name.description: Name of the study as described by the data submitter

analytical_fraction.description: Type of peptide or protein enrichment

experiment_type.description: General strategy used for differential analysis

study_description.description: Describes the objective of the study, data collection, or compilation, etc.

embargo_date.description: Specifies the embargo date, i.e., the release of information with the condition that it cannot be published or disseminated before a certain date.

acquisition_type.type: Data dependent acquisition (DDA), Data independent acquisition (DIA).
acquisition_type.description: The modes of acquisition used in the LC-MS/MS experiments: data dependent acquisition (DDA), data independent acquisition (DIA).

study_short_name.description: A short name for the study
